scripts.deploy: NEXT_PUBLIC_ENVIRONMENT=dev next build && aws s3 sync out/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name PortfolioWebStack-dev --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='WebBucketName'].OutputValue" --output text --region us-east-1)/ --delete --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:dev: NEXT_PUBLIC_ENVIRONMENT=dev next build && aws s3 sync out/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name PortfolioWebStack-dev --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='WebBucketName'].OutputValue" --output text --region us-east-1)/ --delete --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:prod: NEXT_PUBLIC_ENVIRONMENT=prod next build && aws s3 sync out/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name PortfolioWebStack-prod --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='WebBucketName'].OutputValue" --output text --region us-east-1)/ --delete --region us-east-1
